name: Throw Anything

sections.text: You gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls and damage rolls made using an improvised thrown weapon or splash weapon. This bonus stacks with the bonus from the non-mythic Throw Anything feat. If you miss with a thrown splash weapon, it always lands adjacent to its target regardless of how many range increments it was thrown.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You're so skilled at throwing weapons that it hardly matters what you throw.
